0.content: Place("Tokiwadai Middle School")["prestigious girls' school", "females only", "renowned in the world", "requires Esper ability Level Three or higher"]

1.content: Category("Esper")["psychic", "user of supernatural powers", "scientifically based", "emits AIM", "ranked by Levels of strength"]

2.content: Faction("Anti-Skill")["police of Academy City", "security forces", "SWAT unit", "purple symbol", "blue uniform", "SWAT armor", "riot shields", "firearms"]

3.content: Category("Level Five Rank")["highest esper level", "only seven people in Academy City have this rank"]

4.content: Place("Academy City")["Located west of Tokyo", "city of several schools", "most advanced city in the world", "scientists research on psychic powers and higher technology", "composed of 23 districts", "population over 2 millions"]

5.content: Character("Saten Ruiko")["Female", "outgoing",  "friendly", "shameless", "Level Zero", "friends with: {Misaka, Uiharu, Kuroko}", "Student (Sakugawa Middle School)", "Classmate of Uiharu"]

6.content: Character("Misaka Mikoto")["Female", "tsundere", "short tempered", "boyish", "Level Five Esper", "third most powerful esper of Academy City", "Student (Tokiwadai Middle School)", "Railgun", "Electromaster", "Roommate of Kuroko", "Friends with: {Kuroko, Uiharu, Saten}"]

7.content: Character("Shirai Kuroko")["Female", "Level Four Esper", "Teleporter powers", "Student (Tokiwadai Middle School)", "works at Judgement with Uiharu", "Roommate of Misaka", "obsessed with Misaka", "calls Misaka Onee-sama", "Friends with: {Misaka, Uiharu, Saten}"]

8.content: Character("Uiharu Kazari")["Female", "works for Judgement with Kuroko", "expert in computers and hacking", "wears a flower circlet", "Level One", "friends with: {Misaka, Saten, Kuroko}", "Student (Sakugawa Middle School)", "Classmate of Saten"]

9.content: Faction("Judgement")["composed of students", "student-based disciplinary committee", "tasked to maintain peace-and-order within the school system", "members wear armbands on right sleeves", "green shield symbol with white stripes"]
